vampire.config_products.FloodAreaImpactProductImpl module¶

class vampire.config_products.FloodAreaImpactProductImpl.FloodAreaImpactProductImpl(country, valid_from_date, valid_to_date, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.ImpactProductImpl.ImpactProductImpl

Flood Area Impact config file process generation.

Class for generating config file entries for Area impact of Flood Forecasting data product.

generate_config(hazard_file, hazard_dir, hazard_pattern, flood_years=None, forecast_days=None, forecast_period=None, boundary_file=None, boundary_dir=None, boundary_pattern=None, boundary_field=None, output_file=None, output_dir=None, output_pattern=None, masked=False)[source]¶

Generate a config file process for calculating Area Impact of the Flood Forecast product.

Generate VAMPIRE config file processes for the Area Impact of the Flood Forecast product.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Directory path for precipitation files. Default is None.
  • output_dir (string) – Path for product output. If the output_dir is None, the VAMPIRE default Days Since Last Rain product directory will be used.
  • file_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern for finding current precipitation file. Default is None.
  • threshold (float) – Rainfall threshold value.
  • max_days (int) – Number of days to evaluate for days since last rain.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating whether data should be downloaded.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating whether data should be cropped to a boundary.
  • crop_dir (string) – Directory for output of cropped files.
Returns:

Returns string containing the configuration file process.
Return type:

string

Generate VAMPIRE config file header sections for Flood Forecast area impact.
